text:
Isabel is a city in Barber County, Kansas, United States. In 2010, 90 people lived there.
History.
Isabel was created in 1887. Isabel was named after the daughter of a surveyor.
Geography.
Isabel is at (37.468706, -98.551325). The United States Census Bureau says that the city has a total area of. All of it is land.
2010 census.
The 2010 census says that there were 90 people, 40 households, and 23 families living in Isabel.
